title: Tom Carnase
content:

Cheers!
author: mystere540

comments.content: Don’t forget, ITC Avantgarde with Herb Lubalin
Its at the top of the list, but thanks.
I meant that you wrote without Herb Lubalin

Hermann would be really interested that Carnase is getting credit for Chancery. Oh and Lubalin was more than a WITH in the design.

Check deeper please.

Michael

typerror
